chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is iPhone 13 and it has the above issue:
I ordered an iPhone 13, but a iPhone 13 mini was delivered. I kindly request immediate exchange and delivery of the corresponding order.
Thank you for your help,

Hello, 

The customer has informed us that he would like to have a replacement device because he has received the wrong device.

Please let me know the shipment number?

Thank you very much.

Yours sincerely,
Kubra, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request, thank you.

Regards,
YR

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for the 22.05.24. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 26.05.24. we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Ercan from Back Market

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt ist mit Code/Muster gesperrt.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, the device seems to be locked with a code. Kindly assist us in resolving this issue in order for us to proceed. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
YR

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
JH
